au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.name: L1=L2=20m_small
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.initScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) sics.drive('nvs_lambda', 8) sics.set('/instrument/velocity_selector/wavelength', 8) sics.set('/instrument/velocity_selector/wavelength_spread', 0.10) # Drive detector to position sics.set('/instrument/detector/detector_y/speed', 53) driveDet(19250,0) # Drive guide to ga driveGuide(guideConfig.ga) # Drive entrance aperture to 150 (for ga) driveEntRotAp(150) #set sample ap to 5 mm sics.drive('apx', -23) # Drive beamstops up selBs(1) sics.set('beamcenterx', 93.7) sics.set('beamcenterz', 92.2)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.preTransmissionScript: # Move the beamstop out driveBsx(25, 120) # Drive attenuator to 150 driveAtt(150)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.preScatteringScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(25,0) driveBsz(240)
